issue.title: Failed to spawn URDF model in Gazebo, if first link has no inertia properties

content.raw:
One question remains: Why does the new Gazebo (version 1.0+) require inertia in the root link and didn't before?


PS: Here is a new ticket for the KDL parser, which sends out the warning, if root link inertia is specified in the URDF: https://kforge.ros.org/robotmodel/Trac/ticket/6

PPS: Sorry for the spam!
